00049         }

00057         public void LoadMessage(string Input)
00058         {
00059             _Content = Input;
00060             int HeaderEnd = Input.IndexOf("\r\n\r\n");
00061             Header = new MIMEHeader(Input.Substring(0, HeaderEnd + 2));
00062             Input = Input.Substring(HeaderEnd + 2);
00063             Body = new MIMEBody(Input, Header);
00064         }
00065         #endregion
00066

00068

00072         {
00073             get { return _Header; }
00074             set { _Header = value; }
00075         }

00077         private MIMEHeader _Header = null;
00078

00083         {
00084             get { return _Body; }
00085             set { _Body = value; }
00086         }

00093         public string Subject
00094         {
00095             get { try { return Header[Constants.Subject].Attributes[0].Value; } catch { return ""; } }
00096         }

00101         public string To
00102         {
00103             get { try { return Header[Constants.To].Attributes[0].Value; } catch { return ""; } }

00117         public string BodyText
00118         {
00119             get
00120             {
00121                 try
00122                 {
00123                     if (GetMediaType(Header)==MediaEnum.MEDIA_TEXT)
00124                     {
00125                         return Body.Content;
00126                     }
00127                     foreach (MIMEMessage TempMessage in Body.Boundries)
00128                     {
00129                         if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(TempMessage.BodyText))
00130                         {
00131                             return TempMessage.BodyText;
00132                         }
00133                     }
00134                     return "";
00135                 }
00136                 catch
00137                 {
00138                     return "";
00139                 }
00140             }
00141         }
00142 
00146         public string HTMLBodyText
00147         {
00148             get
00149             {
00150                 try
00151                 {
00152                     if (GetMediaType(Header) == MediaEnum.MEDIA_TEXT && GetContentSubType(Header).Equals("html"))
00153                     {
00154                         return Body.Content;
00155                     }
00156                     foreach (MIMEMessage TempMessage in Body.Boundries)
00157                     {
00158                         if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(TempMessage.BodyText))
00159                         {
00160                             return TempMessage.BodyText;
00161                         }
00162                     }
00163                     return "";
00164                 }
00165                 catch
00166                 {
00167                     return "";
00168                 }
00169             }
00170         }
00171 
00175         public string PlainBodyText
00176         {
00177             get
00178             {
00179                 try
00180                 {
00181                     if (GetMediaType(Header) == MediaEnum.MEDIA_TEXT&&GetContentSubType(Header).Equals("plain"))
00182                     {
00183                         return Body.Content;
00184                     }
00185                     foreach (MIMEMessage TempMessage in Body.Boundries)
00186                     {
00187                         if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(TempMessage.BodyText))
00188                         {
00189                             return TempMessage.BodyText;
00190                         }
00191                     }
00192                     return "";
00193                 }
00194                 catch
00195                 {
00196                     return "";
00197                 }
00198             }
00199         }

00208         private string GetContentType(MIMEHeader Header)
00209         {
00210             if (Header != null && Header[Constants.ContentType] != null && Header[Constants.ContentType].Attributes.Count > 0)
00211             {
00212                 string ContentType = Header[Constants.ContentType].Attributes[0].Value;
00213                 if (null != ContentType)
00214                 {
00215                     int Index = ContentType.IndexOf('/', 0);
00216                     if (Index != -1)
00217                     {
00218                         return ContentType.Substring(0, Index);
00219                     }
00220                     else
00221                     {
00222                         return ContentType;
00223                     }
00224                 }
00225             }
00226             return "text";
00227         }
00228 
00234         private MediaEnum GetMediaType(MIMEHeader Header)
00235         {
00236             string ContentType = GetContentType(Header);
00237             int x = 0;
00238             foreach (string TempType in MIMEType.TypeTable)
00239             {
00240                 if (TempType.Equals(ContentType, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
00241                 {
00242                     return (MediaEnum)x;
00243                 }
00244                 ++x;
00245             }
00246             return (MediaEnum)MIMEType.TypeTable.Length - 1;
00247         }
00248 
00254         private string GetContentSubType(MIMEHeader Header)
00255         {
00256             if (Header != null && Header[Constants.ContentType] != null && Header[Constants.ContentType].Attributes.Count > 0)
00257             {
00258                 string ContentType = Header[Constants.ContentType].Attributes[0].Value;
00259                 if (null != ContentType)
00260                 {
00261                     int Index = ContentType.IndexOf('/', 0);
00262                     if (Index != -1)
00263                     {
00264                         return ContentType.Substring(Index + 1, ContentType.Length - (Index + 1));
00265                     }
00266                     else
00267                     {
00268                         return ContentType;
00269                     }
00270                 }
00271             }
00272             return "text";
00273         }
00274         #endregion

00283         public override string ToString()
00284         {
00285             return _Content;
00286         }
